title: Memecoin Rally Fading? Pepe (PEPE), Bonk (BONK), and Dogwifhat (WIF) Lose Momentum
body: If crypto is going up, then the memecoins will probably go up faster than anything else. That said, the inverse of this is also true. Bitcoin continues to balk at the $104,000 resistance, and this has had the effect of putting the dampers on the rest of the market. Do memecoins $PEPE, $BONK, and $WIF still have a rally left in them? Signs are that $PEPE could be about to roll over Source: TradingView $PEPE was not only the leading memecoin over the previous week, but also the highest percentage climber for just about any of the top 100 cryptocurrencies. That said, the $PEPE price has come up against solid resistance. The current weekly candle has stopped short of the 0.382 Fibonacci level and is shaping to leave a longish wick to the upside, unless the bulls can do something about this over Friday and the weekend. Even if the bulls can turn the current weekly candle positive, the major horizontal resistance at $0.00001600 still remains an important barrier to upside continuation. Finally, the Stochastic RSI indicators are getting back to the top. If they start rolling over before $PEPE is able to surpass the all-time high, this whole rally could be a failed one. $BONK bulls must break back above major ascending trendline Source: TradingView The $BONK price has followed a nice rally thus far, with three higher highs and likely another higher low for this week. However, the price has run into the major horizontal resistance at $0.000025 and has been soundly rejected. The rejection has also taken the price below the bull market ascending trendline, but it is currently holding the strong horizontal support. Source: TradingView The weekly time frame gives a clear picture, and shows the importance of the bulls breaking through the ascending trendline. The Stochastic RSI at the bottom of the chart is showing that unless some kind of catalyst arrives soon, the indicators could roll over and head back down, potentially putting paid to any decent upside for the next few weeks. The writing may be on the wall for $WIF Source: TradingView $WIF is in a similar predicament. A good upside surge has come into heavy resistance levels and is looking like being rejected. Yes, there is the possibility that the Stochastic RSI indicators chop along the top for a while, but if a Bitcoin breakout does not happen over this weekend, the writing is probably on the wall for $WIF, and the next potential rally might have to wait several weeks for the Stochastic RSI to reset. Keep your eyes on Bitcoin (BTC) Finally, if Bitcoin (BTC) does succeed in breaking through its $104,000 major horizontal resistance, and goes on to surpass the all-time high, all bets are off. Memecoins would undoubtedly surge in this scenario. Bitcoin is definitely the one to watch. Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice.

title: Hackers Had Access to Coinbase Customer Data Since January: Report
body: Following the recent Coinbase $400 million breach, it has been revealed that hackers gained unauthorized access to sensitive customer data as early as January. A person familiar with the matter said the attackers had constant access by bribing customer service representatives, eventually demanding a $20 million ransom. Culprits Bribed Foreign-Based Support Staff According to a Bloomberg report , the perpetrators targeted employees and contractors based outside the United States who were part of Coinbase‚Äôs business process outsourcing operations. By paying off a small group of insiders, they were able to get sensitive user information. The stolen data included names, birth dates, addresses, government-issued ID numbers, banking details, account balances, and creation dates. This information could be used to impersonate either Coinbase or its customers and potentially access other financial accounts. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs a major breach, the amount of personal information shared is staggering,‚Äù said Mike Dudas, managing partner at web3 firm 6MV and a victim of the attack. The source claimed that the hackers had access to user data since January, but Coinbase Chief Security Officer Philip Martin disputed this. He explained that once the firm was aware of the information sharing, permission was revoked, hence the culprits did not have constant access throughout the period. However, he acknowledged that there were multiple bribery incidents, with Coinbase first detecting signs of suspicious activity from the support agents months before the May 11 ransom demand. Following this, the implicated agents were immediately quarantined and fired. Details From the Breach The exchange disclosed the situation to the public in a Thursday announcement. In a blog post, it revealed that less than 1% of monthly transacting users were affected by the incident. The attackers aimed to build a list of customers to impersonate Coinbase and trick users into handing over their crypto assets. When the $20 million ransom demand was rejected, the bad actors increased their extortion attempts. The company clarified that login credentials, private keys, and Prime accounts were not compromised, and no customer wallets were accessed. In response to the breach, Coinbase has said it will reimburse any users who lost money and boost its internal security systems. It also announced plans to open a new U.S.-based customer support hub. In addition, the firm launched a $20 million bounty for information leading to the attackers‚Äô arrest, tagged stolen funds for recovery, and is working with authorities to pursue criminal charges against the involved insiders. The incident adds to a growing list of cyberattacks targeting the industry. A recent report by Immunefi highlighted that crypto projects lost $92.5 million in April 2025 alone across 15 separate attacks. This figure is a 27.3% increase from the $72.6 million lost in April 2024, and more than double the $41.4 million recorded in March 2025. The post Hackers Had Access to Coinbase Customer Data Since January: Report appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: AI vibe coding: what it is, why it‚Äôs risky, and how to stay safe
body: What is AI vibe coding? AI vibe coding is a novel approach to software development that generates advanced, executable code based on well-crafted natural language user prompts. Yet another innovation fueled by artificial intelligence capabilities, AI vibe coding is proving to be a game-changer, especially for non-technical enthusiasts who can now experiment with software development and contribute to the ever-expanding technology ecosystem. At a fundamental level, AI vibe coding uses advanced machine learning algorithms to interpret natural language instructions and generate corresponding code in the desired software language. Users can input their requirements in plain language, such as ‚Äúcreate a crypto website with a blog section and user login functionality,‚Äù and AI tools will generate the appropriate body of code needed to realize the project. This contrasts with traditional software development practices, which require the user to be skilled in programming languages and incorporate formal reviews along the journey. Notably, Charlie Shrem, an early Bitcoin pioneer, is bringing back the Bitcoin faucet ‚Äî a site where people earn small amounts of Bitcoin by solving CAPTCHAs. His new site, 21million.com, is inspired by a 2010 version that helped spread Bitcoin in its early days. Right now, the site isn‚Äôt fully working and has no Bitcoin ( BTC ) to claim, but Shrem says it‚Äôs meant to help new users get started, with no hidden catch. He‚Äôs building it using AI tools, calling it ‚Äúvibe coding.‚Äù Shrem, who once ran a major Bitcoin exchange, hopes this project will spark fresh interest in Bitcoin. While AI vibe coding can lead to faster software development results, there is a risk that the output generated from a vibe coding approach may not be adequately reviewed and signed off, which is where traditional coding practices continue to offer safeguards. Did you know? The term ‚Äúvibe coding‚Äù was popularized by OpenAI co-founder Andrej Karpathy, who described it as a way to ‚Äúfully give in to the vibes,‚Äù effectively embracing AI-generated code without manually tweaking it. Key features of AI vibe coding Unlike traditional coding, AI vibe coding requires no formal software development qualifications for users to get started. All you need to vibe code is an idea, with the ability to write it clearly using natural language prompts. Fundamentally, AI vibe coding is characterized by the following features: Natural language processing (NLP): AI vibe coding relies heavily on NLP to understand and process user instructions. Machine learning: As with all practical applications of AI, machine learning models trained on vast amounts of coding data are used to generate executable code based on user prompts. Real-time feedback: Users can receive and provide immediate feedback on the output, allowing for efficient code iteration and refinement. Accessibility: Vibe coding democratizes software development, enabling individuals without formal coding training to create functional applications. It lowers or eliminates the entry barriers into programming, empowering more users to participate in technology design and foster innovation from diverse perspectives. Why is AI vibe coding considered risky? Despite its obvious benefits, AI vibe coding carries many risks that users must be aware of and mitigate as required. These risks range from security concerns to ethical and legal implications. Understanding the risks associated with AI vibe coding can help users alleviate potential issues and legal implications. Here‚Äôs a post by Matt Palmer outlining common safeguards to be considered for AI vibe coding. Some of the common risks associated with AI vibe coding are: Security concerns: AI-generated code might be susceptible to vulnerabilities if the underlying algorithms fail to account for security best practices. After all, AI learns from somewhere else! Therefore, inexperienced users might inadvertently create applications prone to cyberattacks, exposing sensitive data and risking user trust. This is particularly concerning when building applications that handle personal or financial information, as even a minor security flaw can have significant repercussions. Code quality: While AI tools can generate functional code, the quality and reliability of this code may vary, and will certainly not cater to all nuances commonly found in a real-world scenario. Similarly, AI‚Äôs understanding of user requirements might not always align perfectly with the intended functionality, leading to bugs and inefficiencies. Furthermore, the AI might not always follow the best coding practices, resulting in code that is difficult to maintain and scale. This can be especially problematic in large-scale projects where code quality is paramount. Ethical concerns: AI vibe coding can raise ethical and legal questions , especially concerning intellectual property. There might be ambiguity in ownership and copyright of AI-generated code, posing challenges for developers and users. Additionally, using AI in coding can lead to ethical concerns about job displacement and the devaluation of human expertise. It's crucial for developers and organizations to navigate these issues thoughtfully and responsibly, especially when relying on vibe coding practices for large-scale project development. Over-reliance on AI: As AI vibe coding becomes more prevalent, there is a risk of developers becoming overly reliant on AI tools, potentially diminishing their traditional coding skills and understanding. This reliance on AI can lead to a lack of deep technical knowledge, making it difficult for developers to troubleshoot issues or innovate independently. Continuous learning and skill enhancement are essential to maintain a balanced approach to software development. Explainability: While AI vibe coders may eventually even get the job done with vibe coding, they may not always have the skills required to review, debug, or refactor their code due to the lack of traditional software development skillsets, impacting the explainability and ultimately, reliability of code. Did you know? A major risk of AI vibe coding is the emergence of ‚Äúslopsquatting,‚Äù a new type of supply chain attack where AI-generated code suggests non-existent package names, which attackers can exploit by creating malicious versions ‚Äî talk about innovating to wreak havoc! How to vibe code safely To mitigate the risks associated with AI vibe coding, users should adopt certain best practices. These practices can help ensure the AI-generated code is secure, reliable and ethically sound. Best practices to vibe code safely include: Learning best practices: Even though AI vibe coding simplifies the development process, users should still familiarize themselves with basic coding principles. This knowledge will help in understanding the AI-generated code and making necessary adjustments. It also enables users to identify potential issues and apply best practices, ensuring the code is robust and maintainable. Implementing security measures: It is crucial to ensure that the AI-generated code adheres to security best practices. As seen in a popular example on X, where a non-technical founder publicly shared his journey to building a web-based application exclusively with vibe coding, a lack of security considerations resulted in cyber threat actors attacking the application, resulting in it being taken down. Users should incorporate security checks and validations to safeguard their applications against potential threats. Regularly updating and patching the code, conducting security audits and following industry standards can help mitigate security risks. Regular audits and reviews: Conducting regular code reviews can help identify vulnerabilities and improve the overall quality of AI-generated code. Collaborating with experienced developers for feedback and insights is highly beneficial. Peer reviews and collaborative coding sessions can provide valuable perspectives and enhance code quality. Understanding ethical and legal implications: Users should know the ethical and legal ramifications of using AI-generated code. Consulting with legal experts on intellectual property and copyright issues can prevent future complications. Additionally, being informed of ethical guidelines and industry standards can help developers navigate the evolving landscape of AI in coding. How can blockchain support AI vibe coding? Blockchain technology has the potential to enhance security, transparency and collaboration in AI vibe coding, complementing existing platforms like GitHub. Here‚Äôs how it can help: Securing AI-generated code: Blockchain‚Äôs decentralized and tamper-resistant design can help verify the integrity of AI-generated code. By recording hashes or proofs of code versions onchain (alongside repositories like GitHub), developers can detect unauthorized changes and maintain a secure, auditable history. Maintaining transparency: While platforms like GitHub track code changes, blockchain can provide an additional transparent, immutable log of modifications and interactions. This makes it easier to trace code evolution and verify its origins, improving accountability in collaborative AI projects. Enhancing collaboration: Blockchain-based systems can offer secure, trustless environments for developers to exchange code, feedback and ideas, complementing centralized platforms like GitHub . Though still emerging, these decentralized approaches have the potential to further strengthen collaboration in AI development.

title: Crypto Price Prediction ‚Äì May 16, 2025: BTC, ETH, SOL, XRP, ADA
body: Here‚Äôs our crypto price prediction for May 16, on a day when the market reacts sheepishly to yesterday‚Äôs Coinbase hack . As a whole, the market is down by 1.3% in the past 24 hours, although its total cap of $3.4 trillion represents a 3% increase in a week and a 26% increase in a month. This has taken place amid a backdrop of encouraging signs regarding the ongoing tariff war between the US and the rest of the world, with the Trump administration and China agreeing to a pause on certain higher tariffs early this week. We therefore take a look at how the biggest altcoins ‚Äì Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Ripple (XRP) and Cardano (ADA) ‚Äì are doing today, and at where they may be going in the near future. Crypto Price Prediction ‚Äì May 16 Bitcoin (BTC) At $103,655, BTC is up by 1.8% in 24 hours , with the original cryptocurrency also sitting on 7% increase in a fortnight and a 23% rise in a month. Looking at its 1-day chart today, we can see that it‚Äôs nearing a medium-term peak, with its indicators close to overbought positions. Source: TradingView Its RSI (purple) recently topped 70 and looks like it could be on its way down, while its 30-day average (orange) has reached a new high in relation to the 200-day (blue). Based on these two indicators, BTC should correct a little soon, although it‚Äôs arguable that it can sustain high levels for a while yet, given that the market oversold it in February, March and early April. We expect it to reach $120,000 at some point in July, provided that the US can continue to negotiate pro-trade deals with more nations, as it did recently with the UK. Ethereum (ETH) ETH is also up today, posting a 2.5% gain in 24 hours and an 8% increase in the last seven days. Its current price is $2,608, which also marks a healthy 43% increase in a fortnight and a 65% gain in a month. Yet it‚Äôs arguably bullish that ETH remains down by 13% in a year, an annual loss which implies that it remains undervalued, and should rebound even further soon enough. Looking at its chart, now appears to be a very good time to buy ETH, since it‚Äôs beginning to regain momentum after a sustained phase of declines. Source: TradingView Its 30-day average is on its way to climb over the 200-day, signalling that the coin could break out very soon. Similarly, its RSI has also spiked again after several months of depression, and given that Ethereum remains such a fundamentally strong token, it has the potential to rise strongly in the imminent future. It could reach $3,000 by the second half of the year, with the winter months bringing a push beyond $4,000. Solana (SOL) SOL has posted a more modest 0.5% gain today, with its current level of $171 making for a 3% increase in a week and a 37% rise in a month. Interestingly, Solana‚Äôs chart today is much like ETH‚Äôs, in that the alt‚Äôs 30-day average is getting ready to form a golden cross with the 200-day. That said, SOL hasn‚Äôt been as weak as ETH has in recent weeks, so it‚Äôs hard to say if it will rally as strongly as its layer-one rival. Source: TradingView Recent days have brought significant SOL transfers to exchanges , so this spring may still remain somewhat unsettled for the token, given the ongoing uncertainty surrounding tariffs and global trade. Still, SOL is another fundamentally strong token, with the upcoming Firedancer upgrade likely to help its price push towards $300 by the end of the year. Ripple (XRP) In contrast to the other tokens in this list, XRP has actually suffered a 2% drop in the past 24 hours. The reason for this drop is that, yesterday, Judge Analisa Torres denied a motion from the SEC and Ripple to grant an indicative ruling that would have essentially closed their long-running legal case once and for all. However, this denial has merely delayed things, with XRP remaining strong in the medium- and long-term. At $2.42, it remains up by 2% in a week, by 16% in a month and by 368% in a year. Its chart today shows that it remains within a growth phase, although its indicators suggest that this could come to an end soon. Source: TradingView Most notably, its 30-day average has been well above the 200-day since early November, something which actually suggests that a correction is overdue. On the other hand, an XRP supporter might argue that the coin had spent years in an oversold position, given Ripple‚Äôs legal issues. As such, XRP could continue to rise throughout the rest of the year (give or take some dips), with the coin on course to reach $3 at some point in Q3. Cardano (ADA) ADA has risen to $0.7779 today , which is a 1% gain in 24 hours and a 29% increase in a month. The altcoin is also up by 70%, with today‚Äôs moves coming after a whale took $53 million in ADA off Coinbase yesterday. This may have simply been a safety precaution in response to yesterday‚Äôs Coinbase hack, although it could also be a whale preparing to hold ADA for the long haul. Either way, ADA‚Äôs chart shows that now may be a very good time to buy the altcoin, given that its 30-day average has just climbed over the 200-day. Source: TradingView As with most other major tokens, this follows a sustained period of declines for the token, so it looks like ADA has opened a more bullish period of gains. That said, its 24-hour trading volume remains relatively modest, at $1.1 billion today, compared to a peak of $8 billion in early March, when Donald Trump suggested that a US crypto reserve would include ADA. But despite a relative lack of demand, the ADA price should return to $1 in the next few weeks, rising to $2 by Q4. Store Your Holdings with Best Wallet Yesterday‚Äôs Coinbase hack raises the importance of having a secure, non-custodial wallet in which to safely house your tokens. And while the market has more than its fair share of wallets to choose from, one that stands out is Best Wallet . Since launching in 2023, Best Wallet has grown to serve more than 250,000 monthly active users, who trust the app wither their holdings. Learn how to prepare to migrate your Best Wallet to enable multi-chain wallets! If you haven‚Äôt made the switch yet, watch this quick video to set up your new multi-chain wallet the right way. Download Best Wallet now! https://t.co/mV4V8pftOK pic.twitter.com/7eisivOjVn ‚Äî Best Wallet (@BestWalletHQ) April 28, 2025 Some of its prime features include its support of over 60 coins, its anonymity (no KYC or user verification), and its streamlined interface. It has become one of the leading non-custodial wallets in crypto, with its app available on Android and iOS. And recently, it launched the presale for its own native crypto, Best Wallet Token (BEST) . The presale has raised in excess of $12.3 million, with investors excited by BEST‚Äôs utility. Best Wallet users will gain access to several benefits by holding BEST, including discounts on fees, special staking bonuses, and early access to new token launches and sales. Over $12M Raised and Counting! title: Crypto Market Trends: Explosive Growth and Key Developments You Need to Know
body: BitcoinWorld Crypto Market Trends: Explosive Growth and Key Developments You Need to Know Welcome back to the exciting world of digital assets! The Crypto Market is constantly buzzing with activity, innovation, and, let‚Äôs be honest, a fair bit of volatility. Staying informed is key, whether you‚Äôre a seasoned investor or just dipping your toes in. We‚Äôre here to break down the most important trends shaping the market right now. Crypto Market Trends: What‚Äôs Driving the Current Momentum? The broader Crypto Market continues to evolve at a breathtaking pace. Several factors are contributing to its current state, from macroeconomic shifts to specific technological advancements within various blockchain ecosystems. We‚Äôre seeing increased institutional interest, clearer regulatory discussions in some regions, and ongoing development in decentralized finance (DeFi) and Web3 applications. What does this mean for you? It means more opportunities, but also the need for diligent research and understanding. Let‚Äôs dive into some specific areas that are particularly noteworthy. Bitcoin Price Prediction: Where is the King of Crypto Headed? Ah, Bitcoin. The original cryptocurrency and still the bellwether for the entire market. Tracking the Bitcoin Price Prediction is a daily ritual for many. Recent price movements have been influenced by a mix of factors, including: Macroeconomic indicators like inflation rates and central bank policies. Institutional adoption news, such as corporations adding BTC to their balance sheets or the approval of Bitcoin ETFs in various jurisdictions. Network developments and hash rate changes. Overall market sentiment and geopolitical events. While predicting the exact price is impossible, many analysts look at historical cycles, technical indicators, and fundamental developments to form their outlooks. Understanding these factors can help you contextualize price swings. Actionable Insight: Instead of focusing solely on short-term price pumps or dumps, consider Bitcoin‚Äôs long-term value proposition as a store of value and a decentralized monetary network. Diversification is also crucial. Ethereum News: The Merge‚Äôs Impact and Beyond Ethereum, the second-largest cryptocurrency by market cap, has undergone significant transformations, most notably ‚ÄòThe Merge‚Äô, transitioning from Proof-of-Work to Proof-of-Stake. This was monumental Ethereum News . The impact of The Merge includes: A dramatic reduction in energy consumption (a major benefit). Changes in ETH issuance (becoming deflationary under certain conditions). Laying the groundwork for future scaling upgrades (like sharding). Beyond The Merge, the Ethereum ecosystem continues to be a hotbed for innovation in DeFi, NFTs, and decentralized applications (dApps). Upcoming upgrades aim to improve scalability and reduce transaction costs (gas fees), which are key challenges for wider adoption. Example: Many popular DeFi protocols and NFT marketplaces are built on Ethereum. Their success and growth are closely tied to the performance and development of the Ethereum network itself. NFT Trends: Are Digital Collectibles Still Shining? Remember the NFT craze? While the initial hype might have cooled slightly from its peak, the world of digital collectibles is far from over. Understanding the current NFT Trends reveals a market that is maturing and diversifying. Key trends include: Increased focus on utility: NFTs are moving beyond simple collectibles to offer access to communities, events, gaming assets, and even real-world benefits. Brand adoption: Major companies are exploring NFTs for loyalty programs, digital merchandise, and customer engagement. Gaming integration: Play-to-earn and blockchain-based games are utilizing NFTs for in-game items and player ownership. New blockchains: While Ethereum is dominant, other blockchains are gaining traction for NFTs, offering lower fees and faster transactions. Challenge: Market saturation and identifying projects with genuine long-term value remain significant challenges for both creators and collectors. Crypto Regulations: Navigating the Evolving Landscape One of the most critical factors influencing the entire Crypto Market is regulation. Governments and regulatory bodies worldwide are grappling with how to classify and oversee digital assets. The landscape of Crypto Regulations is complex and constantly evolving. Why is this important? Clarity can foster institutional adoption and provide consumer protection. Unclear or overly restrictive regulations can stifle innovation and drive activity offshore. Different countries are taking different approaches, creating a patchwork of rules. Actionable Insight: Stay informed about regulatory developments in your region and in major global markets. Compliance is becoming increasingly important for businesses and individuals operating in the crypto space. The interplay between technology, market forces, and regulation will continue to shape the future of the Crypto Market . While volatility is inherent, the underlying technology and its potential for innovation remain strong. Conclusion: Staying Ahead in a Dynamic Market The Crypto Market is a frontier of finance and technology. We‚Äôve touched upon the key trends driving Bitcoin‚Äôs price action, the significant strides made with Ethereum news, the evolving landscape of NFT trends, and the crucial role of navigating crypto regulations. Each of these areas presents unique opportunities and challenges. Staying informed, conducting thorough research, and understanding the risks involved are paramount. As the market matures, we can expect continued innovation, increased adoption, and ongoing dialogue with regulators. The journey is certainly exciting! To learn more about the latest Crypto Market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping the Crypto Market‚Äôs future outlook. This post Crypto Market Trends: Explosive Growth and Key Developments You Need to Know first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Solana Price Prediction: Crypto Experts Spot Golden Cross Pattern Forming, Is SOL About To Blast Past $200?
body: The Solana price has risen by 1.5% in the past 24 hours, with the altcoin reaching $172 as the crypto market as a whole falls slightly today. This means that SOL is now up by 4% in a week and by 38% in the past month, with the sixth-biggest token also posting a 6% gain in a year. But what‚Äôs particularly bullish about today‚Äôs move is that it has happened as the coin‚Äôs 1-day chart is about to form a golden cross, a signal that can indicate an incoming breakout. And with the Solana price still 41% down from its ATH of $293 (set in January), there‚Äôs plenty of scope for some big returns in the next few weeks and beyond. Solana Price Prediction: Crypto Experts Spot Golden Cross Pattern Forming, Is SOL About To Blast Past $200? After a very difficult February, March and early April, Solana has joined the market in moving into a position from which it could gain heavily. As the chart below shows, its 30-day average (orange) is very close to cross the 200-day (blue), forming the aforementioned golden cross. Once this happens, we could see the Solanba price break through its current resistance level at around $180 and rise even higher. Source: TradingView We also see SOL‚Äôs relative strength index (purple) in a higher position, having reached 75 a few days ago. This highlights a growth in buying pressure, with the coin‚Äôs trading volume at $5.3 billion today, which is more than triple where it was at the start of the month. There has also been an uptick in big SOL transfers, with one whale sending over $278 million in Solana to Kraken on May 14. 1,544,974 #SOL (278,796,918 USD) transferred from unknown wallet to #Kraken https://t.co/xAJEBEe54Z ‚Äî Whale Alert (@whale_alert) May 14, 2025 This could suggest that larger investors expect the Solana price to pick up soon, so they‚Äôre getting ready to capitalize on any big movement. Another bullish sign is the fact that SOL‚Äôs funding rate has been firmly positive for almost two weeks now, meaning that more traders are taking out positions in the token. This is a good sign for SOL‚Äôs near future, while the token‚Äôs more distant future remains positive as well, especially with the long-awaited Firedancer update getting nearer to completion. Firedancer will make Solana‚Äôs network more efficient and reliable, further boosting its fundamental strength. SOL current REV: $3bn per year Earnings multiple for growthco: 100x SOL value: $300bn SOL supply: 600mm Implied SOL price: $500 not crazy tbh ‚Äî Brian (@brian_smith_0) May 15, 2025 As such, Solana is likely to witness stronger growth once Firedancer arrives, which in turn will push up the Solana price. The latter could reach $200 in the next few weeks, before reaching $300 by Q4. A New Solana-Based Token for Market-Beating Rallies Solana‚Äôs growth is also bullish for that many coins that operate on its network, and one of the newest and most promising of these is Solaxy (SOLX) . Solaxy has the distinction of being Solana‚Äôs first layer-two network, offering users lower transaction fees and faster confirmation times. It launched the presale for its SOLX token at the start of the year, and has now raised a hugely impressive $36.5 million. We're picking up speed! 36M Raised! pic.twitter.com/H68BVdkcVf ‚Äî SOLAXY (@SOLAXYTOKEN) May 14, 2025 This makes it one of the biggest sales of the year so far, and the main reason for its success is that investors are becoming increasingly confident in its potential. Once launched, it will provide an instant bridge between itself and Solana, while its team will expand its compatibility to other chains over time. It‚Äôs aiming to become a key network for meme tokens and DeFi, tapping into the traffic Solana itself generates in these areas. And because SOLX will be necessary to pay for its transaction fees, the new coin could experience very strong demand. Latecomers can join its presale by going to the Solaxy website and connecting a wallet, such as Best Wallet. SOLX is currently selling at $0.001726, but this will rise again tomorrow, so investors should act sooner rather than later. The post Solana Price Prediction: Crypto Experts Spot Golden Cross Pattern Forming, Is SOL About To Blast Past $200? appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Searching For the Next Hidden Altcoin Gem? Don‚Äôt Ignore This Cardano Competitor Before It Explodes
body: The post Searching For the Next Hidden Altcoin Gem? Don‚Äôt Ignore This Cardano Competitor Before It Explodes appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Despite the overall crypto market downturn this year, the Cardano price has been relatively resilient to the continued bearish pressure. Investor confidence in ADA has been steadily rising due to the network‚Äôs consistent innovation and technological developments. At the same time, an emerging DeFi project, Unilabs (UNIL), is coming into the public view as a rival for the established giant. With large-cap altcoins starting to show signs of recovery after a deep correction, the stage is being set for these new players to thrive. Retail investors are shifting funds into the Unilabs presale, diversifying their ADA holdings to capture one of the best crypto opportunities of this altseason. Many analysts also support the project‚Äôs early-stage growth potential, speculating that this underdog could outperform the Cardano price returns in the 2025 bull run. Is The Cardano Price Gearing Up For Another Massive Rally? After months of consolidation, the Cardano price skyrocketed early last month, gaining over 70% on March 2. However, the wave of profit booking that came after this rally trapped ADA in a falling wedge, taking the price to a low of $0.51 this month. Image Courtesy: TradingView At the time of writing, ADA trades at $0.769, reflecting a 4.45% decrease over the past 24 hours. The current rally started with a sharp trend reversal after the Cardano price breakout from the upper trendline on April 11. Additionally, on the fundamental front, CEO Frederik Gregaardhas revealed the launch of a quantum-secure identity wallet, and that the Cardano and Ethereum Foundations are working together to make the internet quantum-secure. Like Cardano, Unilabs is also bringing revolutionary DeFi utility to the market, positioning it as a strong competitor. Unilabs (UNIL): Challenging ADA With AI-Backed Tech Despite the recent Cardano price recovery, ADA holders are more attracted to the moonshot potential of Unilabs (UNIL), which is taking the DeFi sector by storm. Unilabs is the first AI-powered DeFi asset manager that helps retail investors grab crypto opportunities at an early stage. As of Q2 2025, the platform had $30 million in assets under management, divided into four main funds: AI fund: It targets the upcoming projects, ranging from different machine learning platforms to AI-driven dApps, ensuring you‚Äôre aligned with innovations shaping tomorrow. BTC Fund: This fund tracks Bitcoin‚Äôs price movements, giving conservative investors exposure without having to hold the asset directly. RWA Fund: Offers a hedge against crypto volatility by tokenizing resources and investing capital into RWAs. Investors benefit from the increased liquidity of digital markets. Mining Fund: Crypto mining has been a reliable revenue source since the early days of blockchain technology. This fund provides stable yields across varying market cycles. title: Turing-Complete VM: Bitcoin Solaris Enhances Tezos Smart Contract Capabilities
body: The post Turing-Complete VM: Bitcoin Solaris Enhances Tezos Smart Contract Capabilities appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Tezos introduced formal verification into blockchain with its Michelson smart contract language, prioritizing safety and predictability. While ideal for simple, logic-bound contracts, Michelson‚Äôs restricted syntax and non-Turing-complete architecture limit its use in advanced, dynamic applications. Bitcoin Solaris addresses this constraint by deploying a Turing-complete virtual machine (VM) across its execution layer ‚Äî enabling developers to build complex, flexible smart contracts that scale across verticals. With native support for full arithmetic logic, loop conditions, recursion, and state management, the Bitcoin Solaris VM opens smart contract design to real-world, multi-layered use cases. Combined with high throughput and formal auditability, this system creates the foundation for advanced tech deployments ‚Äî from automated financial instruments to industrial IoT coordination and secure data marketplaces. Dual-Layer Execution Engine Designed for Programmability Bitcoin Solaris operates on a dual-layer architecture purpose-built for separation of concerns: The Base Layer handles security and settlement using Proof-of-Stake (PoS) and Proof-of-Capacity (PoC). It stores finalized states and maintains validator consensus over transaction history. The Solaris Layer manages execution using Proof-of-History (PoH) and Proof-of-Time (PoT), processing contracts with deterministic sequencing and 10,000+ TPS capability. The Turing-complete VM is embedded within the Solaris Layer. Unlike Tezos, where smart contract logic is constrained by the static structure of Michelson, Solaris developers can implement full program logic ‚Äî including data-driven conditions, on-chain oracles, dynamic memory allocation, and recursive state functions. This flexibility is essential for advanced tech protocols that require real-time contract updates, adaptive logic, or multi-party coordination. Developer-Centric Tools and Audit-Ready Compilation Bitcoin Solaris supports modern development workflows through a high-level language abstraction layer, enabling smart contracts to be written in common programming languages that compile down to secure bytecode. Built-in tooling allows developers to simulate contracts across states, verify gas efficiency, and apply formal checks during deployment. The platform also includes support for: Modular upgrades Stateful DApps Cross-contract communication Secure randomness Encrypted parameter calls Together, these capabilities eliminate the friction faced by developers building on platforms like Tezos, where advanced logic requires heavy workarounds. For advanced tech builders focused on automation, AI coordination, or real-time DeFi triggers, the Solaris VM architecture allows direct, efficient implementation at the contract layer. Crypto Legends analyzed the practical limits of Michelson and how Bitcoin Solaris‚Äôs Turing-complete VM resolves common development bottlenecks. The video also explores real-world examples where advanced contract logic is required. Security Verified Across Layers and Execution Pathways Smart contract reliability depends on more than programmability‚Äîit requires secure runtime environments. Bitcoin Solaris‚Äôs infrastructure has undergone comprehensive audits to ensure VM logic, execution constraints, and finality safeguards are secure and predictable: Cyberscope Audit : Validated smart contract opcode behavior and runtime memory handling Freshcoins Audit : Reviewed Solaris Layer‚Äôs Turing-complete bytecode interpreter and multi-threaded execution KYC Verification : Confirmed project governance and technical oversight credentials These reviews confirm that advanced contracts can be executed safely, with consistent state guarantees and minimal gas manipulation risk ‚Äî a core requirement for deploying advanced tech at scale. Presale Phase 3: Build and Participate Before Developer Onboarding Expands Bitcoin Solaris is currently in Presale Phase 3, with BTC-S tokens priced at 3 USDT. This stage offers early access ahead of the public contract registry launch and before developer grants are issued for building within the Turing-complete VM ecosystem. The total supply is fixed at 21 million BTC-S, with 4.2 million tokens (20%) allocated for presale. There is no inflation, and token distribution is tied to mobile mining and validator engagement. Early contributors gain access to contract deployment rights, developer tooling, and resource priority before full network saturation. Tezos pioneered secure smart contracts ‚Äî but Bitcoin Solaris goes further, enabling full programmatic expression through a Turing-complete VM layered within a scalable, high-speed execution environment. For developers and institutions building in advanced tech sectors, Bitcoin Solaris offers the flexibility, performance, and security needed to support next-generation decentralized applications. As presale access continues and developer resources roll out, Bitcoin Solaris redefines what smart contract capability truly looks like. Website: https://bitcoinsolaris.com/ X: https://x.com/BitcoinSolaris Telegram: https://t.me/Bitcoinsolaris

title: Bitcoin Flirting With Danger As BTC Faces Major Resistance Level, Says Trader Jason Pizzino ‚Äì Here‚Äôs His Outlook
body: Analyst and trader Jason Pizzino is issuing a warning on Bitcoin ( BTC ) as the flagship crypto asset hovers below the all-time high. In a new strategy session, Pizzino tells his 351,000 YouTube subscribers that Bitcoin is ‚Äúflirting with danger‚Äù after failing to cross above a resistance level located just below the all-time high price of approximately $109,000. ‚ÄúNow the market‚Äôs reversed and come up and this range [between $94,000 to $105,000] seems to be relatively important because for the last four days now Bitcoin has not been able to close above this 50% level [at around $105,000] on the three-day swing chart.‚Äù Source: Jason Pizzino/YouTube The widely followed analyst says there are key support levels located below the price of $100,000 that Bitcoin must stay above to maintain its bullish prospects. ‚ÄúTo the downside, you don‚Äôt want to see the levels around $91,000, $92,000 up to about $93,500, $94,000‚Ä¶ basically the whole of the low $90,000 range. That‚Äôs the area that you want to see some support. Breakdowns at this level is just going to prolong any sort of move again to the upside and may in fact weaken the overall move.‚Äù According to Pizzino, Bitcoin will retain its bullish prospects if the crypto king manages to hold above the key support levels over the course of this month. ‚ÄúBut if it can hold out these levels basically over May is where we‚Äôre looking for these signals, then possibly the floodgates open.‚Äù Bitcoin is trading at $102,274 at time of writing, about 6% below the all-time high reached in January. ? title: Tinian government overrides veto to issue public stablecoin ahead of the US
body: The Pacific Northern Mariana Islands has overturned Governor Arnold Palacios‚Äô April veto, allowing the small constituent island of Tinian to introduce a stablecoin. With a 14-2 vote, the Tinian government can now license online casinos and have the treasurer manage a new digital currency called the ‚ÄúTinian Stable Token. That means the treasurer will issue, supervise, and redeem the new stable token. The Tinian stable token will be backed by cash and treasury bills If the Tinian stable token is launched before July, Tinian Island may be the first US public jurisdiction to issue its own stablecoin . Ideally, the token will be backed by cash and treasury bills and will be officially named the Mariana‚Äôs US Dollar (MUSD). Mariana‚Äôs Municipal Treasury will also hold the asset‚Äôs reserves on behalf of the government, and transactions involving the token will be processed on the eCash blockchain platform. Additionally, the Marianas Rai Corporation, a tech solutions company, will exclusively provide blockchain infrastructure for the token. The token‚Äôs bill was first passed unanimously by Tinian‚Äôs four-member delegation on March 12 and then sent to Governor Palacios, who vetoed it. Some, of course, did not approve of his veto, asking lawmakers to overturn it, including the Marianas Rai Corporation co-founder and technology chief Vin Armani. Armani claimed the bill will draw in a lot of investment and tax revenue from the crypto industry, requesting lawmakers to discuss the bill again. Clyde Norita, the corporation‚Äôs director and local legal cannabis mogul, argued similarly, claiming the local economy was dwindling and the bill‚Äôs passage would allow business in the region without affecting culture, environment, and immigration status. Thereafter, the nine-member Senate revived it on May 9, voting 7-1 to override. The bill then proceeded to the House, where it also passed. Republican Representative Patrick San Nicolas, a Tinian delegation member who voted on the bill, believes it will help the island recover economically. He added that the bill builds a digital industry that does not rely on tourists or federal subsidies. Another representative who voted against the bill‚Äôs overturn, Marissa Flores, remarked, ‚ÄúEvery time we talk about casinos, there‚Äôs always some kind of bitter pill to swallow. It is true we are in dire need of money, but what I don‚Äôt like is when we are desperate, and we are now forced to make a decision because we are desperate once again. Every time we‚Äôre desperate, it always seems that we come back to casinos.‚Äù The eCash blockchain platform will be observed and supervised The Tinian governor has raised constitutional and enforcement concerns about the bill, doubting the island‚Äôs ability to confine gambling to its own jurisdiction. Nevertheless, the Marianas Rai Corporation is preparing to reveal further development by May 19 to deal with capacity and readiness questions. The eCash blockchain platform will also be supervised to ensure transactions run effectively. Like the Tinian bill, some lawmakers, including Senator Elizabeth Warren, have raised concerns about the revised GENIUS Act presented to the Senate for discussion. Warren detailed that the bill left consumer safety issues unresolved. She suggested that the bill may allow for the political misuse of digital assets. She even cautioned against President Trump, who still has not entirely cut off his past crypto business ties. She also argued that the revisions made to the bill are merely cosmetic and do not fix regulatory gaps. KEY Difference Wire helps crypto brands break through and dominate headlines fast

title: Coinbase Just Delisted MOVE Token ‚Äî Here‚Äôs What That Means for Traders
body: The post Coinbase Just Delisted MOVE Token ‚Äî Here‚Äôs What That Means for Traders appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Coinbase is cleaning house yet again. Just days before it joins the prestigious S&P 500, the crypto exchange has made a bold move: delisting the Movement (MOVE) token. But that‚Äôs not all. From wrapped tokens rolling into New York to a $400 million data breach blowback, this week has been pretty busy for Coinbase. Let‚Äôs break it all down. MOVE Gets the Boot In a post on X, Coinbase confirmed that it has officially disabled trading for Movement (MOVE) as of May 15 at 2 PM ET. The reason was a ‚Äúrecent review‚Äù of listing standards ‚Äì which, let‚Äôs be honest, is corporate speak for ‚Äúthis asset no longer meets the standards.‚Äù We have disabled trading for Movement (MOVE). Your funds will remain accessible to you, and you will continue to have the ability to withdraw your funds at any time. https://t.co/K0YoLhN25K ‚Äî Coinbase Assets (@CoinbaseAssets) May 15, 2025 If you‚Äôre holding MOVE on Coinbase, don‚Äôt panic ‚Äì your funds are still safe. Withdrawals remain open, but trading is off the table. No new orders, no cancellations, no access to the order books. That‚Äôs a problem if you‚Äôre an active trader relying on liquidity to execute real-time strategies. For anyone mid-trade or looking to shift funds, it‚Äôs a frustrating disruption. Coinbase hasn‚Äôt mentioned deposit limitations, but delistings like this often come with hiccups especially for those depending on fast fund access. Wrapped Tokens Are Coming to NY While one token exits, another enters. CBETH ‚Äì Coinbase Wrapped Staked Ethereum ‚Äì is now officially available to users in New York. It‚Äôs part of a broader wrapped token push that includes Cardano, Dogecoin, Litecoin and XRP (cbADA, cbDOGE, cbLTC, and cbXRP). No release dates on those just yet, but they‚Äôre ‚Äúcoming soon,‚Äù according to Coinbase. It‚Äôs a nice pivot toward more compliance-friendly innovation. Expanding in tightly regulated markets like New York means Coinbase is still playing the long game. Inside the $400M Data Breach Ready for ANOTHER bombshell? Coinbase informed that rogue overseas support agents were bribed into leaking sensitive user data ‚Äì including names, masked bank info, and ID docs. While no funds or passwords were touched, the breach opened the door to targeted social engineering attacks. Cleaning up the mess might cost Coinbase up to $400 million. Ouch. Why It Matters Between the MOVE delisting, security concerns, and new token rollouts, Coinbase is juggling risk control with expansion. For traders, it‚Äôs a clear reminder that platform stability can shift overnight ‚Äì and so can your strategy. If MOVE was part of your portfolio, it‚Äôs time to reassess. And if you‚Äôre trading on Coinbase, staying alert is a necessity!

title: Crucial Russia Ukraine Peace Talks in Istanbul Today: What It Means for the Market
body: BitcoinWorld Crucial Russia Ukraine Peace Talks in Istanbul Today: What It Means for the Market Geopolitical shifts can send ripples across global financial markets, and the cryptocurrency space is certainly not immune. Today, the world watches closely as representatives from Russia and Ukraine are scheduled to meet for peace talks in Istanbul. This marks a significant development, being the first face-to-face negotiation in over three years between the warring nations. For crypto investors, understanding the potential outcomes and their market impact is crucial. What‚Äôs Happening at the Istanbul Talks? According to reports from Reuters, citing sources within the Turkish Foreign Ministry, the stage is set in Istanbul for key diplomatic discussions. The schedule indicates a preliminary meeting involving Turkish, U.S., and Ukrainian officials at 07:45 UTC. This is then expected to be followed by the main event: Who: Turkish, Russian, and Ukrainian delegations. Where: Istanbul, Turkey. When: Scheduled for 09:30 UTC today, May 16. Turkey has positioned itself as a mediator in the conflict, and hosting these Istanbul talks underscores its role. While the details of the agenda are not fully public, the primary goal is undoubtedly to find a path towards de-escalation or, optimistically, a resolution to the ongoing conflict. Why Are Russia Ukraine Peace Talks Significant for Markets? Any news related to the conflict between Russia and Ukraine has historically caused volatility across various asset classes, including stocks, commodities, and, notably, cryptocurrencies. Here‚Äôs why these Russia Ukraine peace talks hold particular weight: Historical Context: Previous periods of heightened tension or news of potential talks have led to: Increased price swings in Bitcoin and altcoins. Flight-to-safety narratives sometimes benefiting Bitcoin (seen as digital gold) or causing sell-offs due to global uncertainty. Impact on energy prices, which indirectly affects global economic stability and investor risk appetite. These are the first direct negotiations at this level in a considerable time, suggesting a potential shift in the diplomatic landscape. A positive outcome could signal a path towards stability, potentially boosting investor confidence. Conversely, a breakdown in talks could reignite fears and lead to renewed market downturns. Exploring the Potential Market Impact The outcome of the Istanbul talks is uncertain, but we can consider potential scenarios and their likely effects on the crypto market : Scenario 1: Positive Progress / Agreement Reached Benefits: A significant de-escalation or peace agreement would be seen as a major positive for global stability. This could lead to increased risk appetite among investors, potentially driving flows into assets like cryptocurrencies. Reduced uncertainty often fosters bullish sentiment. Market Reaction: Could trigger a relief rally across traditional markets and potentially the crypto market. Bitcoin and other major cryptocurrencies might see upward price movement as fear subsides. Scenario 2: Talks Yield No Significant Breakthrough Challenges: If the talks conclude without concrete steps towards peace, it could lead to disappointment and a return of uncertainty. The conflict‚Äôs continuation poses ongoing risks to the global economy. Market Reaction: Could result in market stagnation or a sell-off as investors remain cautious. Volatility might persist, reflecting the ongoing geopolitical tension. Scenario 3: Talks Break Down / Increased Tensions Follow Challenges: A complete failure of negotiations could signal a worsening of the conflict. This would likely increase global risk aversion. Market Reaction: Could trigger significant downturns in traditional markets and potentially a sharp decline in the crypto market as investors seek safer havens or exit volatile assets altogether. It‚Äôs important to remember that the crypto market is influenced by many factors, but major geopolitical events like these talks are significant catalysts that can override other trends. What Should Crypto Investors Consider? Actionable Insights Given the potential volatility surrounding these Russia Ukraine peace talks , here are some points for crypto holders and traders to consider: Stay Informed: Follow reliable news sources for updates on the talks‚Äô progress. The outcome could be known relatively quickly after the scheduled time. Expect Volatility: Be prepared for potential sharp price movements in either direction based on the news flow. Review Your Portfolio: Consider your risk tolerance. Geopolitical uncertainty often tests investment strategies. Avoid Emotional Decisions: Reacting impulsively to sudden price swings can be detrimental. Stick to your pre-defined investment plan. Examples from the past year have shown how quickly the market can react to headlines about the conflict. News of troop movements, sanctions, or even the possibility of dialogue has historically moved prices. The Broader Picture: Geopolitical Events and the Crypto Market The correlation between geopolitical events and the crypto market is a subject of ongoing debate. While Bitcoin was initially conceived partly as an uncorrelated asset, major global crises often see it behave like other risk assets, selling off during times of extreme fear. However, it has also seen periods where its decentralized nature is highlighted, attracting investors looking for alternatives to traditional systems or currencies impacted by conflict or sanctions. These Istanbul talks are a prime example of how real-world political events can have tangible effects on the digital asset space. Monitoring these developments is just as important as analyzing on-chain data or technical charts. Conclusion: Watching Istanbul Closely The scheduled peace talks between Russia and Ukraine in Istanbul today represent a critical moment. While the path to peace remains challenging, the fact that these discussions are happening is noteworthy. For the crypto community, the outcome is more than just political news; it‚Äôs a significant factor that could influence short-term market sentiment and volatility. As the delegations meet, staying informed and prepared for potential market reactions is key for navigating the days ahead. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our articles on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action and institutional adoption. title: Rumor: Meta Plans to Acquire Ripple for XRP
body: A recent post by tech influencer Amelie on X has ignited widespread speculation within the cryptocurrency and tech communities. The post suggests that Meta Platforms Inc. (NASDAQ: META), the parent company of Facebook, Instagram, and WhatsApp, is planning to acquire Ripple Labs, the blockchain company behind the digital asset XRP. This rumor has stirred discussions about the potential implications such a merger could have on the digital finance landscape. RUMORS: META PLANS TO ACQUIRE RIPPLE FOR #XRP DO YOU BELIEVE THIS COULD HAPPEN? https://t.co/ELNx6punav pic.twitter.com/0xeCp3L92G ‚Äî ùìêùì∂ùìÆùìµùì≤ùìÆ (@_Crypto_Barbie) May 15, 2025 Assessing the Credibility of the Rumor As of now, there is no official confirmation or credible reports supporting the claim that Meta is in talks to acquire Ripple Labs. Neither company has released statements indicating such negotiations, and no filings or disclosures have been made to regulatory bodies that would typically oversee such significant corporate transactions. Given the absence of verifiable information, the rumor remains speculative. Ripple‚Äôs Strategic Position in the Crypto Ecosystem Ripple Labs has established itself as a significant player in the blockchain and cryptocurrency sectors, particularly through its focus on facilitating cross-border payments using its digital asset, XRP. The company has been proactive in expanding its services and infrastructure to cater to institutional clients. In May 2023, Ripple acquired Metaco, a Swiss-based provider of digital asset custody and tokenization technology, for $250 million. This acquisition aimed to enhance Ripple‚Äôs enterprise offerings, allowing customers to custody, issue, and settle various tokenized assets. Furthermore, Ripple has been involved in other strategic acquisitions to bolster its position in the crypto market. These moves indicate Ripple‚Äôs commitment to expanding its services and solidifying its role in the evolving digital finance ecosystem. Meta‚Äôs Foray into Digital Assets Meta has shown interest in the digital asset space, most notably through its previous attempt to launch the Diem (formerly Libra) stablecoin project. Despite facing regulatory challenges that led to the project‚Äôs discontinuation, Meta‚Äôs involvement signaled its ambition to integrate digital financial services into its platforms. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 While Meta has not publicly disclosed any renewed efforts to enter the cryptocurrency market, the company‚Äôs vast user base and technological infrastructure position it as a potential influencer in the digital finance sector. Potential Implications of a Meta-Ripple Merger If the rumored acquisition were to materialize, it could have significant ramifications for the digital finance industry. Combining Meta‚Äôs extensive global reach with Ripple‚Äôs blockchain technology could accelerate the adoption of digital currencies and reshape the landscape of cross-border payments. However, such a merger would also face considerable regulatory scrutiny. Both companies have previously encountered challenges with financial regulators, and a consolidation of their operations would likely attract attention from authorities concerned with antitrust issues and financial stability. While the rumor of Meta acquiring Ripple for XRP has captured the imagination of many in the tech and crypto communities, it currently lacks substantiated evidence. Both companies have distinct trajectories and face unique challenges in the digital finance space. Until official statements or credible reports emerge, the speculation remains just that‚Äîa rumor. Stakeholders and observers are advised to approach such claims with caution and await concrete information before concluding the future of either company. Times Tabloid is not responsible for any financial losses. title: Bitcoin Weekly SuperTrend Flashes Sell Signal From 2022 Despite BTC/USD Strength
body: In the last few weeks, the sentiment around Bitcoin has turned around as bulls have pushed it past the $100,000 mark once again. Despite the recent drawdown, the BTC price is still bullish, with the market sentiment sitting in greed. However, a new development on the Bitcoin weekly chart could signal an end to the recent bullishness, just like it did back in 2022. Sell Signal From 2022 Reappears Back in 2022, large sell-offs triggered by the crash of the FTX crypto exchange brought an abrupt end to the Bitcoin bull market and plunged investors into months of despair as prices lagged. During this time, a sell signal on the Bitcoin Weekly SuperTrend went off and the result was the over 60% decline of the Bitcoin price. Since then, this sell signal has remained dormant, but now it has returned. Related Reading: Road To $320,000: Bitcoin Enters Trend Continuation, But $109,400 Must Hold Crypto and CMT-Certified analyst Tony Spilotro took to X (formerly Twitter) to share a disturbing formation on the Bitcoin chart. The analyst explained that the sell signal on the weekly supertrend which had been dormant had finally returned. This signal was triggered just below the current all-time high of $109,000 and it seems the market is playing out accordingly. The analyst explained that while the BTCUSD pair continues to show strength, it could be a false strength. This is because the US dollar has weakened recently, which means that this could be the reason behind the strength shown by the BTC price. Additionally, Tony revealed that even the BTCEUR pair has not shown any crossover of the LMACD. Now, given that this rare bearish signal is flashing right now, it could have some serious implications for the crypto market. The first of these would be that this is the top of the market. In such a case, investors could be looking at another drawn-out bear market. When it comes to how low the price could go, going by the 2022 performance, a 60% crash would bring the Bitcoin price back below $50,000. If this happens, it would ravage the already struggling altcoin market, as well as pushing BTC below the cost price of Strategy‚Äôs 500,000 BTC stash, which opens another can of worms on its own. Related Reading: Bitcoin Bull Market: Pundit Reveals When To Sell Everything Bitcoin Needs To Maintain Range Breakout In another post, Tony explained what needs to happen for the current uptrend to be sustained. He pointed out that range breakouts are only completed in a strong, large weekly candle. In addition, the breakout then needs to close out above the upper Bollinger Band for confirmation. Presently, the BTC price is yet to close out above the upper Bollinger Band, which is sitting at $108,507. However, with two weeks still left to go in the month of May, bulls still have time to complete it before the month closes out. Otherwise, the current breakout could fail, and a reversal could push BTC further down. ‚ÄúBulls want to see this within two weeks, leading to a strong May close,‚Äù Tony Spilotro said. Featured image from Dall.E, chart from TradingView.com

title: Trump Memecoin: South Korean Crypto Entrepreneur Scores Exclusive Dinner Invite
body: BitcoinWorld Trump Memecoin: South Korean Crypto Entrepreneur Scores Exclusive Dinner Invite Imagine getting an exclusive dinner invitation to meet a former U.S. President, not through traditional political channels or major corporate sponsorships, but because you hold a significant amount of a specific cryptocurrency ‚Äì a memecoin, no less. This isn‚Äôt a fictional plot; it‚Äôs the reality for a prominent figure in the South Korean crypto scene, highlighting the increasingly intertwined and sometimes unexpected connections between digital assets and high-level politics. The Unexpected Path to a Presidential Dinner: Holding the Trump Memecoin The catalyst for this extraordinary opportunity is the TRUMP memecoin (often referred to by its ticker, TRUMP), a cryptocurrency that has gained traction among supporters of Donald Trump. The token isn‚Äôt officially endorsed by the former president, but its value and community are directly linked to his political activities and popularity. In a fascinating twist, an exclusive gala dinner with Donald Trump on May 22 was reportedly made accessible to the top 220 holders of this specific memecoin. This unique entry requirement underscores a peculiar aspect of the current crypto landscape: how digital asset holdings, even of speculative memecoins, can translate into real-world access and influence. It blurs the lines between digital wealth, community loyalty, and political engagement in ways previously unimaginable. Who is This South Korean Crypto Pioneer? The individual seizing this remarkable opportunity is Oh Sang-rok, the CEO of HYPERITHM, a well-regarded digital asset management firm based in South Korea. In his 30s, Oh represents a generation of crypto entrepreneur s who have built successful ventures in the rapidly evolving blockchain space. His attendance at such a high-profile event signifies the growing global recognition and legitimacy of figures within the crypto industry, even as the industry itself continues to navigate regulatory complexities and public perception challenges. South Korea has a vibrant and highly active cryptocurrency market. It‚Äôs home to some of the world‚Äôs most enthusiastic crypto investors and innovative blockchain companies. For a South Korean figure to gain this level of access on the U.S. political stage through a crypto connection is noteworthy and speaks to the international reach and impact of the digital asset world. What Might a Crypto Entrepreneur Discuss with Donald Trump? Oh Sang-rok himself expressed considerable excitement about the prospect of engaging directly with Donald Trump. According to reports, his primary goal is to discuss the future trajectory of cryptocurrencies and the broader digital asset space. This is a critical time for such discussions, as governments worldwide grapple with how to regulate crypto, integrate blockchain technology, and foster innovation while mitigating risks. Potential discussion points at such a dinner could include: The current regulatory environment for cryptocurrencies in the U.S. and globally. The potential for blockchain technology beyond finance. Attracting crypto innovation and talent to the United States. The role of digital assets in the global economy. Addressing concerns around market volatility and consumer protection. For a crypto entrepreneur like Oh Sang-rok, having a direct line to a potential future president offers an unparalleled opportunity to advocate for policies that could support industry growth and address key challenges. It‚Äôs a chance to move beyond theoretical discussions and engage with a principal decision-maker. Decoding Donald Trump Crypto Stance Donald Trump‚Äôs position on cryptocurrency has seen a notable evolution. Initially expressing skepticism, his stance appears to have softened considerably, particularly as the crypto community has grown into a significant voting bloc and source of potential campaign contributions. Recently, he has made more favorable comments about Bitcoin and other digital assets, positioning himself as potentially more crypto-friendly than some political opponents. This dinner, linked explicitly to holding a crypto asset, further solidifies the perception that Trump is actively engaging with the crypto community. It‚Äôs a strategic move that acknowledges the economic power and political potential of crypto holders. For those in the crypto industry insights are crucial, and understanding how political figures perceive and interact with the space is paramount. Sharing the Crypto Industry Insights Back Home Beyond his direct interaction with Trump, Oh Sang-rok also highlighted his intention to share insights gleaned from the dinner with players in the Korean crypto market. This is a valuable commitment, as understanding the perspectives of U.S. political leaders on crypto has significant implications for global markets, including South Korea. Information shared could cover: Subtle cues about future U.S. regulatory directions. Insights into the administration‚Äôs potential views on specific crypto technologies or applications. Observations on how the U.S. government views the role of international crypto markets like Korea‚Äôs. Such firsthand crypto industry insights from a high-level political interaction can help Korean firms and investors better anticipate market shifts, understand geopolitical factors affecting crypto, and inform their own strategies and advocacy efforts. Benefits and Challenges of This Unique Intersection Benefits: Increased Visibility and Legitimacy: Acknowledgment from a former president, even through a memecoin, can lend an air of legitimacy to the crypto space. Direct Dialogue: Provides a rare opportunity for industry leaders to communicate directly with powerful political figures. Global Connection: Highlights the international nature of crypto and the potential for cross-border influence. Community Engagement: For the TRUMP memecoin holders, it demonstrates a tangible benefit tied to their investment and community participation. Challenges: Memecoin Volatility and Perception: Linking high-level access to a speculative and often controversial asset like a memecoin carries risks and can be perceived negatively by traditional finance or regulatory bodies. Potential for Exploitation: Such events could be seen as leveraging political influence for token promotion, raising ethical questions. Limited Impact: A single dinner, while symbolic, may not necessarily translate into significant policy changes. Focus on Speculation: The emphasis on memecoin holdings rather than substantive industry contributions could detract from serious discussions about blockchain technology‚Äôs potential. The Bigger Picture: Crypto‚Äôs Growing Political Footprint This event is more than just a quirky anecdote about a dinner invite. It‚Äôs a clear indicator of cryptocurrency‚Äôs expanding footprint in the political arena. As crypto adoption grows and the number of individuals holding digital assets increases, politicians are recognizing the need to engage with this community. The existence and surprising influence of tokens like the Trump memecoin demonstrate how crypto can be intertwined with cultural and political narratives. While often viewed skeptically, these tokens create engaged communities that can mobilize and seek representation. Conclusion: A Sign of Changing Times The attendance of a South Korean crypto entrepreneur like Oh Sang-rok at a dinner hosted by Donald Trump, earned through holding a Trump memecoin , is a vivid illustration of the evolving relationship between cryptocurrency and global politics. It underscores the increasing relevance of the crypto entrepreneur voice and highlights how digital asset communities are beginning to command attention from powerful figures. As Donald Trump crypto stance continues to develop, and as global markets seek valuable crypto industry insights , events like this serve as fascinating, albeit unconventional, bridges between the decentralized world of crypto and the corridors of traditional power. It‚Äôs a clear sign that the crypto industry is no longer on the fringes but is actively, and sometimes surprisingly, participating in the global political dialogue. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends and the intersection of blockchain with global events, explore our articles on key developments shaping the crypto industry. This post Trump Memecoin: South Korean Crypto Entrepreneur Scores Exclusive Dinner Invite first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Tether Mints $2 Billion USDT on Tron, Surpassing Ethereum and Reaching $15B in 2025 Issuance
body: Tether, the issuer of the world's largest stablecoin USDT, has minted $2 billion worth of the cryptocurrency within a few hours, with each minting amounting to $1 billion. The minting took place on the Tron network, pushing the total circulation of USDT to over $151 billion and bringing Tether's total issuance for 2025 to $15 billion. The first billion USDT, equivalent to $1 billion USD, was minted at the Tether Treasury, followed by another billion shortly after, totaling $2 billion in new USDT. This significant increase in supply occurred on the Tron blockchain, which now hosts more USDT than Ethereum, with a supply of over $73 billion compared to Ethereum's $71.9 billion. Tron leads with over $73 billion in USDT supply, while Circle's USDC trails at $60.7 billion. To continue reading this as well as other DeFi and Web3 news, visit us at thedefiant.io

title: Over 25,000 Wallets Upgrade to EIP-7702 as ETH Jumps 20% and Dubai Partners for Government Crypto Payments
body: Following the recent launch of the Ethereum Improvement Proposal 7702 (EIP-7702) known as the Pectra upgrade, there has been a marked increase in smart wallet adoption across multiple blockchain networks. Over 25,000 smart accounts have been upgraded to EIP-7702, with 13,013 on Ethereum, 5,588 on Optimism (OP) Mainnet, 5,261 on Binance Smart Chain (BSC), 2,851 on Base, and 229 on Gnosis. Within a week of the upgrade, more than 11,000 EIP-7702 authorizations were recorded on Ethereum alone. Notably, over 4,700 EIP-7702 transactions were recorded shortly after the upgrade, contributing to a 20% rise in the price of Ether (ETH). Additionally, Dubai has partnered with an unspecified entity to enable government crypto payments, highlighting growing institutional adoption. Among the upgraded smart accounts, 6,900 belong to WhiteBit, 4,800 to MetaMask, 4,000 use an unidentified implementation, and 3,400 are associated with OKX. title: FTX to start second round of repayments worth $5B ‚Äì Who gets paid this time?
body: FTX to begin $5B creditor repayments on the 30th of May via BitGo and Kraken. Recovery rates range from 54% to 120%, based on claim type and class. FTX is set to begin its second round of creditor repayments on the 30th of May under its court-approved Chapter 11 reorganization plan. FTX‚Äôs second round of creditor repayments According to the recent announcement , eligible claimants who have completed the necessary pre-distribution steps will start receiving funds through their chosen platforms, i.e., Bitgo or Kraken, within a few business days. This phase will see over $5 billion distributed, marking a major milestone in the collapsed exchange‚Äôs ongoing efforts to compensate affected users and rebuild trust. As per the plan, FTX‚Äôs repayment process will cover four distinct creditor classes, with recovery rates ranging from 54% to as high as 120%, depending on the nature of the claims. These figures are based on the U.S. dollar value of assets held by customers at the time of the platform‚Äôs collapse in November 2022. What‚Äôs more? Class 5 claimants, including Alameda Research partners, trading vendors, and lenders will recover 54% to 72% of validated claims. FTX will repay smaller, unsecured creditors approximately 61%, while it will settle intercompany claims from subsidiaries in full, with an added 20%. In fact, the FTX Recovery Trust has already pushed over 90% of eligible claims into the distribution pipeline, and BitGo and Kraken will transfer funds within one to three business days after the 30th of May. Remarking on the same, John J. Ray III, Plan Administrator of the FTX Recovery Trust, said, ‚ÄúThese first non-convenience class distributions are an important milestone for FTX. The scope and magnitude of the FTX creditor base makes this an unprecedented distribution process, and today‚Äôs announcement reflects the outstanding success of the recovery and coordination efforts of our team of professionals. Our focus remains on recovering more for creditors and resolving outstanding claims.‚Äù Will the crypto market turn bearish once again? However, while previous FTX‚Äôs distribution had triggered a prolonged crypto winter, casting doubts on market stability, the current scenario tells a more nuanced story. Despite ongoing concerns, such as Solana [SOL] ‚Äòs recent price dip from $224 to $140 driven by heavy sell-offs, reduced activity, and looming token unlocks, the broader market remains resilient. The global crypto market cap has reached $3.44 trillion, reflecting a modest 1.1% uptick in the last 24 hours, as per CoinGecko. Bitcoin [BTC] has surged to $103,655 with a 1.7% daily gain, while Solana traded at $171.14 despite recent turbulence. These indicators suggest that while caution is warranted, the market isn‚Äôt necessarily entering a full bearish phase just yet.

title: Altcoins Consolidate Within a Narrow Range‚ÄîHas the Altseason Been Deferred to Q3 or Q4 2025?
body: The post Altcoins Consolidate Within a Narrow Range‚ÄîHas the Altseason Been Deferred to Q3 or Q4 2025? appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The crypto markets are experiencing heightened activity as volatility increases, thereby affecting the majority of altcoins.
